answers.answer: No . But the common thing on thyroid disease is a switch in isulin within blood.Usually - because diabetes is an autoimmune issue - the thyroid could also have autoimmune issues too that are being missed..

WELCOME to our Community!  There is great info in our Health Pages on the FNA biopsy for a thyroid nodule .. a must-read for info before if you are wondering about the procedure, etc.I had one in 2006.C~partial 1/07

title: Diabetes and your Thyroid
